original_text: To him who is able to keep you from stumbling and to present you before his glorious presence without fault and with great joy—
korean_text: 능히 너희를 보호하사 거침이 없게 하시고 너희로 그 영광 앞에 흠이 없이 기쁨으로 서게 하실 이

sentences.original_text: To him who is able to keep you from stumbling
and to present you before his glorious presence
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분의 영광스러운 앞에 너희를 나타내실

sentences.original_text: without fault and with great joy
